pages.text: Owls are usually active during the night, and usually spawn in forests and taigas. They drop Feathers, like any bird.$(br2)Owls can be tamed with Raw Rabbit, and bred with Raw Chicken.

As a possible $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$(), Owls will increase their friend's capability of flight, namely making $(l:bewitchment:tools/brooms)Brooms$() cost no $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$().$(br2)They also won't take any fall damage, in case they somehow fall.
